casebody.data:
STATE
v.
BATES. 2016-1783 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 27, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motion for admission pro hac vice of Alexis J. Hoag and Cara McClellan. Motion granted. Pursuant to Gov.Bar R. XII(4), counsel shall file a notice of permission to appear pro hac vice with the Supreme Court's Office of Attorney Services within 30 days.
